citations.narrative:
A facility representative was not available to allow access from 8:45 AM to 9:15 AM on 06/19/2015. While waiting at
the property gate for 30 minutes, I called all three phone numbers on file and each number was disconnected.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
A facility representative was not available to allow access from 8:45 AM to 9:15 AM on 06/19/2015.  While waiting at
the property gate for 30 minutes, I called all three phone numbers on file and each number was disconnected.
